description:
Putting our clients first has resulted in unparalleled success -- Corboy & Demetrio has acquired more than $4 billion in verdicts and settlements, of which more than 600 were $1 million or higher. Year in and year out, our firm and our attorneys are uniformly judged the best of the best, garnering hte highest honors in the legal profession. Co-founder Thomas A. Demetrio was ranked the #1 Super Lawyer in Illinois in 2020 -- the top attorney out of more than 94,000 lawyers in the state. It's the fourth year in a row Tom has been ranked the top lawyer in Illinois by IL Super Lawyers having been ranked #1 in 2017, 2018 and 2019 too.

Partner Philip Corboy, Jr. was named to Top 100 Attorneys by Super Lawyers in 2020 for the ninth consecutive year.

Our firm was named to the 2020 Edition of Best Law Firms by U.S. News for the 11th year, since the awards inception.

Over our 60-year history, our law firm, which is based in Chicago, has assisted the people nationwide with numerous personal injury matters, including the following:

• Automobile accidents
• Trucking accidents
• Aviation accidents
• Mass transit accidents
• Ride-share accidents
• Sports injury claims
• Catastrophic injuries
• Medical malpractice
• Pharmaceutical injury claims
• Defective medical device claims
• Product liability claims
• Premises liability claims
• Workers' compensation
• Railroad negligence and FELA claims
• Construction accidents
• Wrongful death claims

When you work with our exceptional attorneys, you can rest assured they will give you the support you need during an undoubtedly trying time in your life.

All of our law firm's partners have received high praise and accolades from our peers, including being named part of the Leading Lawyers Network here in Illinois along with AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell. This means that you will be able to receive the highest level of support available due to the years of hard work, education and dedication from each of our attorneys.

Take the first step toward pursuing the maximum amount of compensation you need and deserve with no risk and no obligation by contacting Corboy & Demetrio today to schedule your free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
